content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Mr. Abbasi. I appreciate you considering my apartment for rent. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a careful student looking for the most affordable option, I want to propose starting the negotiation with a price lower than your initial thought, perhaps around 700 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but 700 Euros per month is far below my expectations. I am looking for a price that reflects the quality of the apartment and its prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your perspective but still seeking an affordable option, could we consider negotiating around 850 Euros per month as a compromise that suits both parties?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While 850 Euros is a step closer to my expectations, I am certain that the market value of this apartment is higher. I appreciate your compromise, but I am not ready to accept this price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: If the market value is significantly higher, I don't want to continue the negotiation solely based on my limited knowledge of the area, as it may not meet the apartment's true worth. I apologize for any inconvenience caused. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
